messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Ah-ha! I found me a Trainer!I challenge you to battle with
the Pokémon I’ve found!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
It’s a challenge trying to win with
Pokémon one isn’t familiar with...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Discovery is the treasure I seek.
Collecting a lot is my life!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Ah-ha! I found me a Trainer!I challenge you to battle with
the Pokémon I’ve found!
